stimulusHtml: The diagram above depicts demand and supply curves in a cityâ€™s rental housing market. If a price ceiling of $1,000 is imposed on the market, which of the following will occur?
choicesHtml: There will be a surplus of rental housing in the city.
The demand curve for housing will shift to the right.
The supply curve for housing will shift to the right.
The quantity of rental housing supplied will decrease.
The quantity of rental housing demanded will increase.
